Plot: A soccer star jailed for assault leads a group of inmates in a match against prison guards.
Title: Mean Machine
Writer: Tracy Keenan Wynn (earlier screenplay "The Longest Yard"), Charlie Fletcher (screenplay), Chris Baker (screenplay), Andrew Day (screenplay)
Actors: Vinnie Jones, David Kelly, David Hemmings, Ralph Brown
tomatoConsensus: Despite some genuine wit, this crowd pleaser is filled with too many cliches.
